title: SCREEN FLICKERING AND GLITCHING
body: I'm just playing league and the game crashed. Then a few games later the screen started to flicker, and gets all glitchy and crap. And I have to turn on V sync to play it properly, but it affects my performance. I play on medium graphics, full screen. uncapped fps(90-120)

replies.body: You may just need to have v-sync on in order to make sure the graphics are being displayed properly, but I would also go ahead and check for possible driver updates. Just as some additional precautions, go ahead and do the steps outlined in this handy [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well to cover all your bases.
That isn't the answer Im looking for
Thing is, I never had to turn it on before until now...man wtf
Ayyyy I'm a huge proponent of "whatever the heck works" xD
It happened to me and I don't know what to do. I uninstalled the game and I did a full repair but still does the same flicker.
I'm getting the same thing too. It's really annoying. Any help would be nice!
